sources.title: The Seventh Survivor
sources.description: “A cross between ‘Phantom Light’ and ‘Lifeboat’” (IMDB review quote). From IMDB: Survivors from a torpedoed passenger vessel are rescued by a lighthouse crew. Ironically, the German captain responsible for the attack is also rescued and held prisoner, but an unknown spy among the survivors plans to help him escape. IMDB rating 6.4. Directed by Leslie Hiscott. Released in 1942 (UK only). Complete print.

metadata.Plot: Survivors from a torpedoed passenger vessel are rescued by a lighthouse crew. Ironically, the German captain responsible for the attack is also rescued and held prisoner, but a spy among the survivors plans to help him escape.
metadata.Actors: Austin Trevor, Linden Travers, John Stuart
